translation.text: Train #332, scheduled to depart Winnetka at 11:09 a.m., will not operate due to high wind warnings.  Train #330, scheduled to depart at 10:05 a.m., will accommodate passengers.  Train #330 is a delayed departure due to the high wind warnings.
Milwaukee West train #2209 schedule to arrive Big Timber at 9:50a.m., may be operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule due to signal problems.

Metra Union Pacific Northwest line inbound train #640 scheduled to arrive Chicago at 9:29 a.m. is on the move operating with extensive delays due to a high wind warning. Anticipated train movement to stop near Crystal Lake. Duration unknown.

Train #321, scheduled  to depart Chicago at 10:02 a.m., will not operate due to high wind warnings.  Train #319, scheduled to depart Chicago at 9:32 a.m., is a delayed departure and will accommodate passengers.  Extensive delays are anticipated.
Metra Union Pacific North line inbound and outbound trains remain halted due to high wind warnings. Estimated time of delay is unknown. Updates will be provided. Updated 9:21am

Inbound train #112, scheduled to arrive in Chicago at 9:39 a.m. remains stopped due to high wind warnings. The estimated time of delay is unknown.  Metra will update you once the train is on the move. Updated at 9:28 a.m.
Metra Union Pacific West line inbound and outbound trains halted due to high wind warnings. Estimated time of delay is unknown.
Metra Union Pacific Northwest line inbound and outbound trains remain halted due to high wind warnings. Estimated time of delay is unknown. Update: 9:05 a.m.
Van Buren Street Platform elevator is out of service. Alternative accessible locations are 11th Place Museum Campus and Millennium Station.
Metra Alert ME - Homewood East Side Construction Will Begin March 13

Beginning Monday, March 13, access to the Homewood Station from the east will be closed for station construction until Summer 2024.  Access to the boarding platform will be through the Park Avenue entrance ONLY (west side of tracks).

 

Beginning, Monday, March 6, the Pace bus stop will relocate from Harwood Avenue to Park Avenue.  Please allow additional time and use caution near the work zone.
Metra Alert BNSF - Attention Berwyn Commuters: Starting July 5, 2023, Stanley Avenue will be under construction for approximately 14 weeks.
Attention Berwyn Commuters: Starting July 5, 2023, Stanley Avenue will be under construction for approximately 14 weeks. Please use caution through the work zone and allow extra travel time.
Metra Alert ME - 79th street/Chatham Station Closure Beginning July 10 - Station Rebuild Project

The 79th street/Chatham station on the Metra Electric line will be closed beginning Monday, July 10 for approximately 7 months. During this time passengers can use 75th and 83rd street stations as alternatives. This is part of the Metra Electric Community initiative to transform multiple stations on the Metra Electric District. Once completed, stations will have enclosed ADA-accessible street-level entrances, lobbies with elevators, new stairs, headhouses, new composite deck platforms, new lighting, and signage.  For more information click here.
Metra Alert UP-N - Ravenswood Station Platform 2 Opening August 1

Beginning Tuesday, August 1, the inbound platform which is platform #2 at Ravenswood station will be open for service. Access to the platform will be through Lawrence Ave entrance only.  Allow additional time to access the platform.  Please use caution near the work zone.
